entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 p.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 5.2Â°C

Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 4:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy

Visibility: 32 km
